metadata.description:
This dataset includes data recorded by the Heihe integrated observatory network obtained from an observation system of Meteorological elements gradient of A’rou Superstation from January 1 to December 31, 2019. The site (100.464° E, 38.047° N) was located on a cold grassland surface in the Caodaban village, A’rou Town, Qilian County, Qinghai Province. The elevation is 3033 m. The installation heights and orientations of different sensors and measured quantities were as follows: air temperature and humidity profile (HMP45C; 1, 2, 5, 10, 15 and 25 m, towards north), wind speed profile (010C; 1, 2, 5, 10, 15 and 25 m, towards north), wind direction profile (020C; 2 m, towards north), air pressure (CS100; 2 m), rain gauge (TE525M; 5 m, towards south), four-component radiometer (CNR4; 5 m, towards south), two infrared temperature sensors (SI-111; 5 m, towards south, vertically downward), photosynthetically active radiation (PAR-LITE; 5 m, towards south, vertically upward), soil heat flux (HFP01SC; 3 duplicates, -0.06 m, 2 m in the south of tower), a TCAV averaging soil thermocouple probe (TCAV; -0.02, -0.04 m, 2 m in the south of tower), soil temperature profile (109; 0, -0.02, -0.04, -0.06, -0.1, -0.15, -0.2, -0.3, -0.4, -0.6, -0.8, -1.2, -1.6, -2, -2.4, -2.8 and -3.2 m, 3 duplicates in -0.04 m and -0.1 m), and soil moisture profile (CS616; -0.02, -0.04, -0.06, -0.1, -0.15, -0.2, -0.3, -0.4, -0.6, -0.8, -1.2, -1.6, -2, -2.4, -2.8 and -3.2 m, 3 duplicates in -0.04 m and -0.1 m).
The observations included the following: air temperature and humidity (Ta_1 m, Ta_2 m, Ta_5 m, Ta_10 m, Ta_15 m and Ta_25 m; RH_1 m, RH_2 m, RH_5 m, RH_10 m, RH_15 m and RH_25 m) (℃ and %, respectively), wind speed (Ws_1 m, Ws_2 m, Ws_5 m, Ws_10 m, Ws_15 m and Ws_25 m) (m/s), wind direction (WD_2 m) (°), air pressure (press) (hpa), precipitation (rain) (mm), four-component radiation (DR, incoming shortwave radiation; UR, outgoing shortwave radiation; DLR_Cor, incoming longwave radiation; ULR_Cor, outgoing longwave radiation; Rn, net radiation) (W/m2), infrared temperature (IRT_1 and IRT_2) (℃), photosynthetically active radiation (PAR) (μmol/(s m-2)), average soil temperature (TCAV, ℃), soil heat flux (Gs_1, Gs_2 and Gs_3) (W/m2), soil temperature (Ts_0 cm, Ts_2 cm, Ts_4 cm_1, Ts_4 cm_2, Ts_4 cm_3, Ts_6 cm, Ts_10 cm_1, Ts_10 cm_2, Ts_10 cm_3, Ts_15 cm, Ts_20 cm, Ts_30 cm, Ts_40 cm, Ts_60 cm, Ts_80 cm, Ts_120 cm, Ts_160 cm, Ts_200 cm, Ts_240 cm, Ts_280 cm and Ts_320 cm) (℃), and soil moisture (Ms_2 cm, Ms_4 cm_1, Ms_4 cm_2, Ms_4 cm_3, Ms_6 cm, Ms_10 cm_1, Ms_10 cm_2, Ms_10 cm_3, Ms_15 cm, Ms_20 cm, Ms_30 cm, Ms_40 cm, Ms_60 cm, Ms_80 cm, Ms_120 cm, Ms_160 cm, Ms_200 cm, Ms_240 cm, Ms_280 cm and Ms_320 cm) (%, volumetric water content).
The data processing and quality control steps were as follows: (1) The AWS data were averaged over intervals of 10 min for a total of 144 records per day. The soil heat flux was missing during January 1 to 19 because of broken of the sensor line; Soil heat flux (G2) were wrong during July to August. The soil moisture and temperature data were missing during September 3 to October 27 due the data logger malfunction. The missing data were denoted by -6999. (2) Data in duplicate records were rejected. (3) Unphysical data were rejected. (4) The data marked in red are problematic data. (5) The format of the date and time was unified, and the date and time were collected in the same column, for example, date and time: 2019-9-10 10:30. (6) Finally, the naming convention was AWS+ site no. Moreover, suspicious data were marked in red.
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) and Che et al. (2019) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2019年1月1日至2019年12月31日黑河水文气象观测网上游阿柔超级站气象要素梯度观测系统数据。站点位于青海省祁连县阿柔乡草达坂村，下垫面是亚高山山地草甸。观测点的经纬度是100.4643E, 38.0473N，海拔3033m。空气温度、相对湿度、风速传感器分别架设在1m、2m、5m、10m、15m、25m处，共6层，朝向正北；风向传感器架设在10m处，朝向正北；气压计安装在2m处；翻斗式雨量计安装在阿柔超级站28m观测塔上；四分量辐射仪安装在5m处，朝向正南；两个红外温度计安装在5m处，朝向正南，探头朝向是垂直向下；光合有效辐射仪安装在5m处，朝向正南，探头朝向是垂直向上；土壤部分传感器埋设在塔体正南方向2m处，其中土壤热流板（自校正式）（3块）均埋设在地下6cm处；平均土壤温度传感器TCAV埋设在地下2cm、4cm处；土壤温度探头埋设在地表0cm和地下2cm、4cm、6cm、10cm、15cm、20cm、30cm、40cm、60cm、80cm、120cm、160cm、200cm、240cm、280cm、320cm处，其中4cm和10cm这两层有三个重复；土壤水分传感器分别埋设在地下2cm、4cm、6cm、10cm、15cm、20cm、30cm、40cm、60cm、80cm、120cm、160cm、200cm、240cm、280cm、320cm处，其中4cm和10cm这两层有三个重复。
观测项目有：风速（WS_1m、WS_2m、WS_5m、WS_10m、WS_15m、WS_25m）(单位：米/秒)、风向（WD_10m）(单位：度)、空气温湿度（Ta_1m、Ta_2m、Ta_5m、Ta_10m、Ta_15m、Ta_25m和RH_1m、RH_2m、RH_5m、RH_10m、RH_15m、RH_25m）(单位：摄氏度、百分比)、气压（Press）(单位：百帕)、降水量（Rain）(单位：毫米)、四分量辐射（DR、UR、DLR_Cor、ULR_Cor、Rn）(单位：瓦/平方米)、地表辐射温度（IRT_1、IRT_2）(单位：摄氏度)、光合有效辐射（PAR）(单位：微摩尔/平方米秒)、平均土壤温度（TCAV）(单位：摄氏度)、土壤热通量（Gs_1、Gs_2、Gs_3）(单位：瓦/平方米)、土壤水分（Ms_2cm、Ms_4cm_1、Ms_4cm_2、Ms_4cm_3、Ms_6cm、Ms_10cm_1、Ms_10cm_2、Ms_10cm_3、Ms_15cm、Ms_20cm、Ms_30cm、Ms_40cm、Ms_60cm、Ms_80cm、Ms_120cm、Ms_160cm Ms_200cm、Ms_240cm、Ms_280cm、Ms_320cm）(单位：体积含水量，百分比)、土壤温度（Ts_0cm、Ts_2cm、Ts_4cm_1、Ts_4cm_2、Ts_4cm_3、Ts_6cm、Ts_10cm_1、Ts_10cm_2、Ts_10cm_3、Ts_15cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_30cm、Ts_40cm、Ts_60cm、Ts_80cm、Ts_120cm、Ts_160cm Ts_200cm、Ts_240cm、Ts_280cm、Ts_320cm）(单位：摄氏度)。
观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保每天144个数据（每10min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示；土壤热通量在1.1-1.19日之间，7-8月G2，由于传感器线头接触不良，数据缺失；9.3-10.27由于采集器的问题，土壤温湿度数据缺失。（2）剔除有重复记录的时刻；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）数据中以红字标示的部分为有疑问的数据；（5）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2019-6-10 10:30；（6）命名规则为：AWS+站点名称。
黑河综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)和Che et al. (2019)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

background: The two-source energy balance (TSEB) model was successfully applied to estimate evaporation (E), transpiration (T), and evapotranspiration (ET) for land covered with vegetation, which has significantly important applications for the terrestrial water cycle and water resource management. One-source evapotranspiration estimation models combine the soil–vegetation components into a single source. However, in real landscape conditions, the surface is heterogeneous and contains a mixture of soil and vegetation having different temperatures and resistance to energy exchange. Therefore, one-source models explicitly cannot estimate the surface evapotranspiration accurately because the effect of.

Shuttleworth and Wallace proposed a typical two-source evapotranspiration estimation model in which the energy partition is assumed to occur in both “the above canopy” and “the under soil” cases. Water vapor and heat meet over the reference height in the interior of the canopy. Moreover, the mixed water vapor and heat can only exit through the top of the canopy; the total heat flux is in addition to the fluxes coming from every surface layer. However, the model is complex, having over five resistances that cannot be accurately calculated. In addition, the model includes required parameters and observations that cannot be readily obtained from operational satellite- and ground-based data; therefore, the range of applications of the model is limited.

The TSEB model has undergone several revisions, improving the estimation of soil and canopy net radiation, the aerodynamic resistance of the soil surface, the fractional vegetation coverage observed at the radiometer view angle, the distribution of regional-scale near-surface air temperature, and soil and canopy component temperatures. Because the TSEB model only requires the surface energy balance model with a single measurement of land surface temperature, the original model and subsequent refinements have been widely used to estimate E and T under a wide variety of vegetation types, vegetation coverage, climates, and spatial scales. However, most studies have only evaluated the total fluxes or ET (soil plus canopy) in comparison with measurements using the Bowen ratio–energy balance system, the eddy covariance (EC) system, or the large aperture scintillometer.

Accurately estimating surface fluxes in a strongly advective irrigated agricultural area is a particularly challenging task and is even more difficult when the EC flux measurements of H and LE have an incomplete energy balance closure with respect to the available energy Rn−G0. The previous sensitivity studies found that the TSEB model performance is mainly affected by the uncertainty in surface–air temperature difference. Sometimes, this difference is dominant due to the errors in determining the surface soil and vegetation component temperatures from the surface composite radiometric temperature. In this letter, it is shown that there is an overestimation of the component temperatures compared with the observed composite radiometric. This often leads to the most crucial effect on the TSEB model performance. In addition, another factor is the strong advective environment in this region.

The objective of this letter is to estimate E, T, and ET using the soil and canopy component temperatures observed via a high-resolution thermal camera as inputs to a series TSEB model and to subsequently better validate E, T, and ET using a combination of the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotope technique and EC measurements.

methods: In this letter, the field observations were obtained from the Daman superstation installed in the central oasis, which is a 40-m boundary layer tower located at 100.3722° E, 38.8555° N and at an elevation of 1556 m. The meteorological parameters were measured every 10 min and included air temperature, wind speed, humidity at 5 m over the ground, four-component radiations (measured at 12 m above the ground using a four-component radiometer), and turbulent fluxes (measured at 4.5 m above the ground using an EC system with a sampling frequency of 10 Hz). The soil heat fluxes were measured using three heat plates located 6 cm under the ground. A Fluke Ti55 thermal infrared camera was manually operated on a 25-m-high platform on a boundary layer tower to measure the thermal radiation of the cropland approximately every 120 min; the observations were collected as thermal images from approximately 07:00 to 19:00 China Standard Time (CST) during the daytime. The ground-based measurement data were applied to partition ET into E and T applying the Craig–Gordon model.

To evaluate the TSEB model accurately, the soil heat flux was using the ground measurement. In addition, the soil and canopy sensible heat fluxes were estimated using the series TSEB model, and their latent heat fluxes were calculated while solving the energy balance equations (1) and (2), respectively. The soil and canopy component temperatures were calculated using the images obtained with the thermal camera. To calculate the component temperatures, the visible and NIR images were classified into soil and canopy pixels using the maximum-likelihood method. Next, the soil and canopy directional brightness temperatures were exacted from the thermal images. Finally, the thermal infrared temperatures were converted to the radiation temperatures using the incoming long-wave radiation from the sky and the soil and canopy emissivities. Next, the simulated radiometric temperatures were validated against the surface radiometric temperatures, which were calculated according to the incoming long-wave radiation observed by the four-component radiometer.
dataset: The experimental area is an artificial oasis that is covered with maize, vegetables, and orchards. findings: Our results indicated that even under the strongly advective conditions, the TSEB model produced reliable estimates of the E/ET% and T/ET% ratios and of ET. The mean bias and root-mean-square error (RMSE) of E/ET% were 1% and 2%, respectively, and the mean bias and RMSE of T/ET% were −1% and 2%, respectively. In addition, the model exhibited relatively reliable estimates in the latent heat flux, with mean bias and RMSE values of 31 and 61 W·m−2, respectively, compared with the measurements from the EC system. These results demonstrated that a robust soil and vegetation component temperature calculation was crucial for estimating E, T, and ET. Moreover, the separate validation of E/ET% and T/ET% provides a good prospect for TSEB model improvements.

Our results demonstrated that the TSEB model using soil and canopy component radiometric temperatures, which were obtained from a high-precision thermal infrared camera, can be applied in a strongly advection-irrigated agricultural area. Notably, the results illustrated that the latent fluxes of the soil and vegetation components were successfully separated with reasonable accuracy, as assessed using ground-based measurements. The estimated E/ET% and E/ET% values agreed well with the values observed using the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes technique during the early, middle, and late growing seasons. In addition, the TSEB model produced reliable estimations of Rn, H, and LE; the mean biases of Rn, H, and LE were −18, 5, and 31 W ·m−2, respectively, and the RMSEs of Rn, H, and LE were 29, 19, and 61 W · m−2, respectively. This finding suggests that given accurate soil and vegetation component temperatures, E and T can be accurately separated from ET using the TSEB model.
backgroundCn: 双源能量平衡（TSEB）模型成功应用于估算植被覆盖土地的蒸发（E）、蒸腾（T）和蒸散（ET），这对陆地水循环和水资源管理具有重要意义。单源蒸散估算模型将土壤-植被组件合并为一个单一源。然而，在真实的景观条件下，表面是异质的，包含具有不同温度和能量交换阻力的土壤和植被的混合物。因此，单源模型显然无法准确估算表面蒸散，因为其影响。

Shuttleworth和Wallace提出了一种典型的双源蒸散发估算模型，该模型假设能量分配发生在“树冠上方”和“土壤下方”两种情况。水蒸气和热量在树冠内部的参考高度相遇。此外，混合的水蒸气和热量只能通过树冠顶部排出；总热通量是除了来自每个表层的通量之外的额外通量。然而，该模型复杂，具有超过五个无法准确计算的阻力。此外，该模型还包括一些所需的参数和观测数据，这些数据无法从操作卫星和地面数据中轻易获得；因此，该模型的应用范围受到限制。

TSEB模型经过多次修订，改善了土壤和冠层净辐射的估算、土壤表面的气动阻力、在辐射计视角下观察到的植被覆盖度、区域尺度近地面气温的分布以及土壤和冠层组分的温度。由于TSEB模型只需要一个地表温度的单一测量值来进行表面能量平衡模型的计算，因此原始模型及其后续改进已被广泛用于在各种植被类型、植被覆盖、气候和空间尺度下估算蒸散发（E）和温度（T）。然而，大多数研究仅评估了与使用波恩比-能量平衡系统、涡度协方差（EC）系统或大孔径闪烁仪的测量结果相比的总通量或蒸散发（土壤加冠层）。

在强烈对流的灌溉农业区域，准确估计表面通量是一项特别具有挑战性的任务，尤其是在能量平衡闭合不完全的情况下，EC通量测量的H和LE与可用能量Rn−G0之间存在差异。之前的敏感性研究发现，TSEB模型的性能主要受到表面-空气温差不确定性的影响。有时，这种温差由于从表面复合辐射温度中确定表面土壤和植被组分温度的误差而占主导地位。本文显示，与观察到的复合辐射温度相比，组分温度存在过高估计。这往往对TSEB模型的性能产生最关键的影响。此外，该地区的强对流环境也是另一个因素。
research objectiveCn: 在这封信中，地面测量的土壤和冠层成分温度被用来估算蒸散（E）、蒸发（T）和蒸散量（ET），这些估算通过稳定的氧和氢同位素以及使用涡度协方差（EC）系统的ET测量结果进行了更好的验证，得到了E（E/ET%）和T（T/ET%）的观察比率。
这封信的目的是利用通过高分辨率热像仪观察到的土壤和冠层组件温度作为输入，估算蒸发（E）、蒸腾（T）和蒸散发（ET），并随后通过稳定氧和氢同位素技术与涡动相关（EC）测量的结合，更好地验证E、T和ET。
challengesCn: 然而，目前的复合温度分离方法在干旱地区的有效性有限。此外，E和T在地面上难以测量。

导出组件温度的误差主要是由于图像分类错误造成的；这些分类错误随着植被丰度的变化而变化。H估计的不确定性不仅是由于TSEB模型的不确定性，还由于EC系统的不确定性增加，当灌溉农田的平均H较小时，这种不确定性为18%。由于图像像素分类错误，土壤像素被计算为植被像素，这导致在植被丰度发展的情况下，冠层温度被高估。另一方面，忽略大气向上辐射和透射率可能导致估计温度的不确定性。此外，估计的通过冠层的短波和长波辐射透射率的不确定性可能是Rn估计误差的另一个来源。
methodsCn: 在这封信中，现场观测数据来自于安装在中央绿洲的达曼超级站，该站是一座40米高的边界层塔，位于东经100.3722°，北纬38.8555°，海拔1556米。气象参数每10分钟测量一次，包括地面5米处的气温、风速、湿度，12米高处使用四分量辐射计测量的四分量辐射，以及在离地面4.5米处使用10 Hz采样频率的涡度相关系统测量的湍流通量。土壤热通量通过位于地下6厘米的三个热板进行测量。一台Fluke Ti55热红外相机在边界层塔的25米高平台上手动操作，约每120分钟测量一次农田的热辐射；观测数据在中国标准时间（CST）白天的07:00至19:00之间收集为热图像。基于地面测量数据，应用Craig-Gordon模型将蒸散发（ET）分解为蒸发（E）和蒸腾（T）。

为了准确评估TSEB模型，土壤热通量使用地面测量数据。此外，土壤和冠层的感热通量是通过系列TSEB模型估算的，而它们的潜热通量则通过求解能量平衡方程（1）和（2）计算得出。土壤和冠层的组件温度是通过热像仪获取的图像计算得出的。为了计算组件温度，使用最大似然法将可见光和近红外图像分类为土壤和冠层像素。接下来，从热图像中提取土壤和冠层的方向亮度温度。最后，利用来自天空的入射长波辐射和土壤及冠层的发射率，将热红外温度转换为辐射温度。最后，模拟的辐射温度与根据四分量辐射计观测的入射长波辐射计算的表面辐射温度进行了验证。
datasetCn: 实验区是一个人工绿洲，覆盖着玉米、蔬菜和果园。使用了第170、173、176、192、195、231、252和256天的数据来确定蒸散发（ET）及其在多尺度蒸散发观测实验（Multi-Scale Observation Experiment on Evapotranspiration over heterogeneous land surfaces）中的蒸发（E/ET%）和蒸腾（T/ET%）的比率，这项实验是黑河水联合遥测实验研究（Heihe Water Allied Telemetry Experimental Research，HiWATER-MUSOEXE）的一部分。
findingsCn: 我们的结果表明，即使在强烈的对流条件下，TSEB模型仍然能够可靠地估计E/ET%和T/ET%比率以及ET。E/ET%的平均偏差和均方根误差（RMSE）分别为1%和2%；而T/ET%的平均偏差和RMSE分别为−1%和2%。此外，该模型在潜热通量的估计上也表现出相对可靠的结果，与EC系统的测量值相比，平均偏差和RMSE值分别为31和61 W·m−2。这些结果表明，稳健的土壤和植被组件温度计算对于估计E、T和ET至关重要。此外，E/ET%和T/ET%的单独验证为TSEB模型的改进提供了良好的前景。

我们的结果表明，使用高精度热红外相机获得的土壤和冠层组件辐射温度的TSEB模型可以应用于强烈的平流灌溉农业区域。值得注意的是，结果表明土壤和植被组件的潜在通量成功地以合理的精度分离，经过地面测量的评估。估计的E/ET%和E/ET%值与在早期、中期和晚期生长季节使用稳定氧和氢同位素技术观察到的值非常一致。此外，TSEB模型对Rn、H和LE的估计也很可靠；Rn、H和LE的平均偏差分别为−18、5和31 W·m−2，Rn、H和LE的均方根误差（RMSE）分别为29、19和61 W·m−2。这一发现表明，给定准确的土壤和植被组件温度，E和T可以通过TSEB模型准确地从ET中分离出来。

background: The alpine region is important in riverine and watershed ecosystems as a contributor of freshwater, providing and stimulating specific habitats for biodiversity. In parallel, recent climate change, human activities, and other perturbations may disturb hydrological processes and eco-functions, creating the need for next-generation observational and modeling approaches to advance a predictive understanding of such processes in the alpine region. Water resources in the alpine region are headwaters that need to be regulated to sustain downstream ecosystems. However, perturbations induced by nature/climate change and human activities in recent years have significantly reformed hydrological processes and eco-functions. Accurate estimation and prediction of hydrological processes and their key impact factors has since become crucial.

Unfortunately, the scarcity of observation data in the alpine region, due to the difficulties of access and technological barriers, has hindered alpine hydrological modeling and associated research yet motivated the development of next-generation ecosystem observation networks and experiments. In comparison with the observations, using remote sensing data combined with data assimilation could improve the prediction of hydrological processes. However, due to the complexities of the earth system, there exist various sources of uncertainties in remote sensing data (especially in the alpine region), which have to be validated and calibrated. In summary, to fill the knowledge gap and promote alpine region hydrology research, an integrated, distributed and multiscale observation dataset is essential and expected to provide accurate forcing data for hydrological modeling, validate remote sensing data, allow the evaluation of distributed models and ultimately improve a predictive understanding of alpine hydrological processes and ecosystem functions. In alpine hydrology, in addition to consistent hydrometeorological data obtained from distributed meteorological stations, snow cover and frozen ground are two important indexes and driving forces that manipulate hydrological processes. The maximum snow water equivalent (SWE) before ablation determines the storage of snowmelt – a major source of freshwater in the alpine region, while freeze-thaw cycles (FTCs) and soil moisture within the active layer alter water infiltration and, consequently, surface runoff and groundwater. To promote alpine hydrology research, the International Network for Alpine Research Catchment Hydrology (INARCH) was launched in 2015 by the Global Energy and Water Exchanges (GEWEX) project of the World Climate Research Programme (WCRP), involving 18 catchments around the world. The INARCH has since connected individual observatories into an international network and data-share platform to lead frontier research on alpine region hydrometeorology and snow observation. Another community-based observation network, the Circumpolar Active Layer Monitoring (CALM) network, was initiated in the early 1990s to observe the response of the active layer and near-surface permafrost to climate change. The Heihe River Basin (HRB) is the second largest inland river basin in China and is known for its heterogeneous landscapes, diverse ecosystems, unique geographical characteristics and climate change over recent decades. As a major component of the ecohydrological processes in the arid/semi-arid HRB, the alpine hydrological processes, especially those related to snow cover and frozen ground in the upper reaches, have great impacts on runoff in the mountainous region, which then regulate agricultural development in the middle reaches and the ecosystems of the lower reaches.

In recent years, with climate warming, permafrost degradation has significantly affected runoff and the carbon cycle (Peng et al., 2016; Gao et al., 2018). Snow cover is widely distributed with unique characteristics in the study area. In the high-altitude mountainous region (elevation > 3800 m), influenced by the local microclimate and low temperature, snowfall could occur in any season. Temporary snow is the major snow cover type in the region at middle and low elevations because strong solar radiation and high air temperature lead to fast melting and sublimation of the snow. Drifting snow is also commonly observed in the region, which may lead to the redistribution of snowpack in high elevation regions (Essery et al., 1999; Li et al., 2014).

Blowing (drifting) snow is commonly observed in the Qilian mountain due to its high altitude and complex terrain. It is important to estimate the occurrence of blowing snow because it may cause redistributions of the snow cover and influence the sublimation of snow.

Soil heat conductivity is difficult to analyze because it is a function of soil density, soil moisture content (ice content in frozen ground), and soil temperature, which cannot be easily calculated using a simple formula. Therefore, site observations can be utilized to evaluate the parameterization of alpine hydrologic models.

methods: Gap-free meteorological and hydrological data were monitored from an observation network connecting a group of automatic meteorological stations (AMSs). In addition, to capture snow accumulation and ablation processes, snow cover properties were collected from a snow observation superstation using state-of-the-art techniques and instruments. High-resolution soil physics datasets were also obtained to capture the freeze-thaw processes from a frozen ground observation superstation.

Considering the characteristics of the study site, an integrated, distributed and multiscale hydrometeorological – snow – frozen ground observation network has been established with seven automatic meteorological stations (AMSs) and two superstations. At the basin scale, the observation aims to collect data for investigating the meteorological driving forces and for validation of the alpine hydrological models. At the sub-basin scale, small-scale observations and measurements focus on data such as precipitation, soil temperature and moisture, which are used to develop and improve hydrologic models, as well as to validate remote sensing products at medium to coarse resolutions (Jin et al., 2014). At the two superstations for snow cover and frozen ground observations, remote sensing products can be further validated using fine-resolution data. In total, seven AMSs, as well as the frozen ground and snow superstations (also incorporating meteorological observations), were established in the study area during the intensive observation period (IOP: 2013 -2014) to obtain the spatially distributed meteorological variables. After the IOP, four typical AMSs were selected and retained for continuous observation, which is expected to provide long-term datasets. The observed meteorological variables include wind (speed and direction), air temperature, humidity, infrared temperature, air pressure, four-component radiation, and precipitation. Accumulation and depletion processes were measured automatically at the Yakou snow superstation. The observed components included snow depth, snow water equivalent (SWE, measured by GammaMONitor, GMON), albedo of the snow surface and blowing (drifting) snow flux (measured by FlowCapt). Soil temperature and moisture were measured within six layers at each AMS, while evapotranspiration (ET) was observed by eddy covariance (EC) at three AMSs located in permafrost, seasonally frozen ground and a transient zone to observe freeze-thaw (FT) processes. At the sub-basin scale, a wireless sensor network (WSN) with 40 nodes was established to capture seasonal changes in soil temperature and moisture. At the A’rou frozen ground superstation, soil temperature and moisture profiles were intensively measured in eighteen layers to a depth of 3.2 m (in a nested pattern with more layers in the topsoil) to obtain the soil hydrothermal features under freeze-thaw cycles (FTCs). In addition, thermal conductivity and hydraulic conductivity in the topsoil were also measured to observe the dynamic hydrothermal processes within.

backgroundCn: 阿尔卑斯地区在河流和流域生态系统中具有重要意义，作为淡水的来源，提供并刺激特定栖息地的生物多样性。与此同时，近年来气候变化、人类活动和其他扰动可能会干扰水文过程和生态功能，这就需要下一代观测和建模方法来推进对阿尔卑斯地区这些过程的预测理解。阿尔卑斯地区的水资源是需要调节的源头水，以维持下游生态系统。然而，近年来自然/气候变化和人类活动引发的扰动显著改变了水文过程和生态功能。因此，准确估计和预测水文过程及其关键影响因素变得至关重要。

不幸的是，由于高山地区观测数据的稀缺，主要是由于获取困难和技术障碍，阻碍了高山水文建模及相关研究，但也促使了下一代生态系统观测网络和实验的发展。与观测数据相比，结合数据同化的遥感数据可以改善水文过程的预测。然而，由于地球系统的复杂性，遥感数据（尤其是在高山地区）存在各种不确定性来源，这些都需要进行验证和校准。总之，为了填补知识空白并促进高山地区水文研究，集成的、分布式的和多尺度的观测数据集是必不可少的，预计将为水文建模提供准确的强迫数据，验证遥感数据，评估分布式模型，并最终改善对高山水文过程和生态系统功能的预测理解。在高山水文学中，除了从分布式气象站获得的一致的水文气象数据外，雪盖和冻土是两个重要的指标和驱动因素，影响水文过程。融化前的最大雪水当量（SWE）决定了雪融水的储存——这是高山地区淡水的主要来源，而冻融循环（FTC）和活层内的土壤水分则改变了水的渗透，从而影响地表径流和地下水。为了促进高山水文研究，国际高山研究流域水文网络（INARCH）于2015年由世界气候研究计划（WCRP）的全球能量与水交换（GEWEX）项目发起，涉及全球18个流域。自那时以来，INARCH将各个观测站连接成一个国际网络和数据共享平台，以引领高山地区水文气象和雪观测的前沿研究。另一个基于社区的观测网络，极圈活层监测（CALM）网络，早在1990年代初就启动，旨在观察活层和近地表永久冻土对气候变化的响应。黑河流域（HRB）是中国第二大内陆河流域，以其异质的景观、多样的生态系统、独特的地理特征和近年来的气候变化而闻名。作为干旱/半干旱黑河流域生态水文过程的主要组成部分，高山水文过程，特别是与上游雪盖和冻土相关的过程，对山区的径流产生了重大影响，从而调节中游的农业发展和下游的生态系统。

近年来，随着气候变暖，永冻土的退化显著影响了径流和碳循环（Peng et al., 2016; Gao et al., 2018）。研究区域内雪盖广泛分布，具有独特的特征。在高海拔山区（海拔 > 3800 米），受当地微气候和低温的影响，任何季节都可能出现降雪。临时雪是该地区中低海拔地区的主要雪盖类型，因为强烈的太阳辐射和高气温导致雪的快速融化和升华。漂移雪在该地区也常见，这可能导致高海拔地区雪层的重新分布（Essery et al., 1999; Li et al., 2014）。
由于祁连山的高海拔和复杂地形，常常观察到吹雪（漂移雪）。估计吹雪的发生是重要的，因为它可能导致雪盖的重新分布，并影响雪的升华。
土壤热导率的分析比较困难，因为它是土壤密度、土壤水分含量（在冻土中为冰含量）和土壤温度的函数，这些因素无法通过简单的公式轻易计算。因此，可以利用现场观测来评估高山水文模型的参数化。

methodsCn: 无间断的气象和水文数据通过连接一组自动气象站（AMSs）的观测网络进行监测。此外，为了捕捉雪的积累和融化过程，使用先进的技术和仪器从一个雪观测超级站收集了雪盖特性数据。高分辨率的土壤物理数据集也从一个冻土观测超级站获得，以捕捉冻融过程。

background: Accurate monitoring of surface fluxes over land surfaces is necessary for global climate change research, ecological environment management, and agricultural and water resource planning. The magnitude of the surface flux is largely determined by vegetation parameters, soil moisture and other states of the land surface. The major methods used for estimating surface fluxes are field measurement, remote-sensing-based methods, and land surface modeling. The variability in field measurements of surface flux has been documented over diurnal, seasonal, and inter-annual time scales.

Land surface models have been rapidly developed to predict surface fluxes on continuous spatial and temporal scales with physical constraints. Regardless of their specific model structures, all land surface models require observational data to calibrate their parameters and adjust their states. New techniques such as data assimilation are needed to integrate either field or remotely sensed observations with the models, thus improving model accuracy by correcting the model state variables and parameters. Data assimilation has played an increasingly important role in improving predictions of such land surface state variables as the leaf area index, soil temperature profile, soil moisture profile, and other related variables, e.g., surface fluxes.

Spatially distributed estimates of surface flux can be obtained from remote-sensing-based methods. The surface fluxes also can be obtained based on variational techniques and relatively simple models with the assimilation of field-measured land surface temperatures. In a land surface model, the sensible and latent heat fluxes are diagnostic variables, and they are affected by many factors (e.g., model states and parameters). As a new-generation Chinese polar orbiting meteorological satellite, the FY-3 series consists of two experimental (FY-3A/B) and at least four operational satellites (FY-3C/D/E/F). The FY-3 series is expected to have a service life that lasts until 2020. The FY-3A was launched in the year 2008. Visible and infrared radiometer (VIRR) is one of the 11 sensors mounted on the FY-3A satellite and has a nominal spatial resolution of approximately 1 km×1 km at the nadir. The common land model (CoLM) is a state-of-the-art model developed by many groups and validated with extensive field data sites. In CoLM, soil moisture is important for dividing the net radiation into the ground heat, sensible, and latent heat fluxes.

Inaccurate surface flux predictions are highly correlated with errors in land surface temperature estimates. Generally, the diurnal variation trends of the land surface temperature and surface flux can be predicted correctly using the CoLM. The daily averaged evaporation fraction (EF, ratio between latent heat flux and available energy) can be used to describe the splitting of available energy into sensible and latent heat fluxes. The LAS instrument can measure the sensible heat flux at a larger scale than the EC system.
research objective: In this work, a dual-pass data assimilation scheme is developed to improve predictions of surface flux.

The current study constructed a dual-pass data assimilation scheme with an ensemble Kalman filter (EnKF) to improve the surface flux predictions with assimilation of remotely sensed land surface temperature. This study carried out the first experiment to assimilate remotely sensed land surface temperatures (LST) derived from FY3A-VIRR into a land surface model.

In this study, a dual-pass data assimilation scheme was constructed to estimate the surface fluxes via the independent optimization of the soil moisture and vegetation parameters. The aim of this study was to eliminate or reduce the errors between the model simulation and observation.
challenges: Methods are difficult to use for continuous monitoring of surface fluxes because the data derived from satellites are instantaneous and often contaminated by the presence of clouds.

However, these measurements are difficult to use for monitoring surface fluxes at the regional scale because they only produce either point or patch-scale data. The deviations between the FY3A-VIRR LST data and the ground measurements are determined by many factors. The terrain effect can affect the accuracy of the FY3A-VIRR LST retrievals. The mismatch of the spatial and temporal scales between the FY3A-VIRR and field-measured LST can also cause these biases.

The differences between the sensible heat fluxes measured by the EC and LAS system are primarily caused by the energy imbalance of the EC, the heterogeneity of the underlying surfaces, and the differences between the source areas of the EC and LAS measurements. Because of the short memory of the land surface temperature, it is difficult to assimilate the land surface temperatures. Directly assimilating land surface temperature to optimize soil moisture may cause model simulations that are more unstable.
methods: In this work, a dual-pass data assimilation scheme is developed to improve predictions of surface flux. Pass 1 of the dual-pass data assimilation scheme optimizes the model vegetation parameters at the weekly temporal scale, and Pass 2 optimizes the soil moisture at the daily temporal scale. Based on ensemble Kalman filter (EnKF), the land surface temperature (LST) data derived from the new generation of Chinese meteorology satellite (FY3A-VIRR) are assimilated into common land model (CoLM) for the first time. Six sites, Daman, Guantao, Arou, BJ, Miyun and Jiyuan, are selected for the data assimilation experiments and include different climatological conditions.

The dual-pass data assimilation technique employed in this study optimizes the model states and parameters independently. The two passes of the scheme assimilate the remotely sensed land surface temperatures (LST) derived from the FY3A satellite. With the assimilation of the FY3A-VIRR LST data, Pass 1 is used to optimize the model parameters at the weekly temporal scale, and Pass 2 is used to optimize the soil moisture at the daily temporal scale. Six Chinese flux observation sites with different land cover types (alpine meadow, grassland, cropland, and orchard) were selected to conduct the data assimilation experiments. The FY3A-VIRR LST data are compared with the ground measurements.

In this study, the MODIS LAI products are incorporated directly into the model, and the vegetation parameters are optimized at the weekly temporal scale with Pass 1 of the dual-pass data assimilation scheme. At the daily temporal scale, the soil moisture is optimized with Pass 2 of the dual-pass data assimilation scheme. The land surface temperature data from the new generation Chinese meteorology satellite FY3A-VIRR were assimilated into CoLM for the first time based on the EnKF algorithm. The source areas of the LAS measurements were calculated using a footprint model and overlaid with a FY3A-VIRR pixel.
dataset: The land surface temperature (LST) data derived from the new generation of Chinese meteorology satellite (FY3A-VIRR) are assimilated into common land model (CoLM) for the first time. Six sites, Daman, Guantao, Arou, BJ, Miyun and Jiyuan, are selected for the data assimilation experiments and include different climatological conditions. The results are compared with those from a dataset generated by a multi-scale surface flux observation system that includes an automatic weather station (AWS), eddy covariance (EC) and large aperture scintillometer (LAS).

The FY-3A land surface temperature data will become the new data source for global water and energy balance research. The FY3A-VIRR LST products can provide the LST and emissivity of each pixel, and the data are stored in a hierarchical data format (HDF), which is a sinusoidal projection with a spatial resolution of 1 km. Data from six sites located in three major nature zones (western arid and semi-arid area, eastern monsoon area, and Qinghai-Tibet alpine meadow) of People’s Republic of China (PRC) are used for the data assimilation experiments.
findings: The results indicate that the dual-pass data assimilation scheme is able to reduce model uncertainties and improve predictions of surface flux with the assimilation of FY3A-VIRR LST data.

The dual-pass data assimilation scheme reduced the model uncertainties and improved the prediction abilities of the model. The average BIAS values of the six sites changed from 28.7 to 5.3 W m 2 and from 16.9 to 16.1 W m2; the average RMSE values dropped from 71.7 to 46.8 W m 2 and from 93.7 to 70.8 W m 2; and the average R-values increased from 0.75 to 0.78 and from 0.66 to 0.82, respectively. The average BIAS values of the assimilation EF results dropped from 0.21 to 0.01, the average RMSE values dropped from 0.31 to 0.15, and the average R-values increased from 0.43 to 0.73. The comparisons showed that the assimilation results match well against the LAS measurements, and the correlations between the assimilation results and LAS measurements were higher than that of the model simulations at the Daman, Guantao, Arou, BJ, and Jiyuan sites.
backgroundCn: 对陆地表面通量的准确监测对于全球气候变化研究、生态环境管理以及农业和水资源规划是必要的。表面通量的大小在很大程度上取决于植被参数、土壤湿度和其他地表状态。估算表面通量的主要方法包括现场测量、基于遥感的方法和陆面模型。现场测量的表面通量在日变化、季节变化和年际变化的时间尺度上存在变异性。
陆面模型的快速发展使其能够在连续的空间和时间尺度上预测表面通量，并具备物理约束。无论其具体模型结构如何，所有陆面模型都需要观测数据来校准其参数并调整其状态。新技术如数据同化被需要用来将现场或遥感观测与模型整合，从而通过修正模型状态变量和参数来提高模型的准确性。数据同化在提高陆面状态变量预测的准确性方面发挥了越来越重要的作用，例如叶面积指数、土壤温度剖面、土壤湿度剖面以及其他相关变量，如表面通量。

空间分布的表面通量估计可以通过基于遥感的方法获得。表面通量也可以通过变分技术和相对简单的模型，结合现场测量的地表温度进行同化来获得。在陆面模型中，显热和潜热通量是诊断变量，受到许多因素的影响（例如，模型状态和参数）。作为新一代中国极轨气象卫星，FY-3系列包括两颗实验卫星（FY-3A/B）和至少四颗运营卫星（FY-3C/D/E/F）。FY-3系列预计服务寿命将持续到2020年。FY-3A于2008年发射。可见光和红外辐射仪（VIRR）是FY-3A卫星上安装的11个传感器之一，具有约1 km×1 km的名义空间分辨率（在天顶方向）。共同陆面模型（CoLM）是由多个团队开发的先进模型，并经过广泛的现场数据验证。在CoLM中，土壤湿度对于将净辐射划分为地面热、显热和潜热通量非常重要。
不准确的表面通量预测与地表温度估计的误差高度相关。一般来说，CoLM能够正确预测地表温度和表面通量的日变化趋势。日均蒸发分数（EF，即潜热通量与可用能量的比率）可以用来描述可用能量在显热通量和潜热通量之间的分配。LAS仪器能够在比EC系统更大规模上测量显热通量。
research objectiveCn: 在这项工作中，开发了一种双重通道数据同化方案，以改善对表面通量的预测。
本研究构建了一种双重数据同化方案，采用集合卡尔曼滤波器（EnKF）来改善表面通量预测，并同化遥感地表温度。该研究首次进行实验，将来自FY3A-VIRR的遥感地表温度（LST）同化到陆面模型中。
在这项研究中，构建了一种双重数据同化方案，通过独立优化土壤湿度和植被参数来估计表面通量。该研究的目的是消除或减少模型模拟与观测之间的误差。
challengesCn: 由于卫星获取的数据是瞬时的，并且常常受到云层的干扰，因此对于表面通量的连续监测，方法的使用是困难的。
然而，这些测量数据在区域尺度上监测表面通量时很难使用，因为它们只能产生点或斑块尺度的数据。FY3A-VIRR LST 数据与地面测量之间的偏差受到许多因素的影响。地形效应会影响 FY3A-VIRR LST 检索的准确性。FY3A-VIRR 与现场测量的 LST 之间的空间和时间尺度不匹配也可能导致这些偏差。
通过EC和LAS系统测量的显热通量之间的差异主要是由于EC的能量不平衡、底层表面的异质性以及EC和LAS测量的源区之间的差异。由于地表温度的短期记忆，直接同化地表温度以优化土壤湿度可能会导致模型模拟的不稳定性。
methodsCn: 在这项工作中，开发了一种双重通道数据同化方案，以改善地表通量的预测。双重通道数据同化方案的第一通道在周尺度上优化模型植被参数，第二通道在日尺度上优化土壤湿度。基于集合卡尔曼滤波器（EnKF），首次将来自新一代中国气象卫星（FY3A-VIRR）的陆面温度（LST）数据同化到常见陆面模型（CoLM）中。选择了六个站点，分别是大满、馆陶、阿柔、北京、密云和济源，进行数据同化实验，这些站点具有不同的气候条件。
本研究采用的双重数据同化技术独立优化模型状态和参数。该方案的两个阶段同化来自FY3A卫星的遥感地表温度（LST）。在同化FY3A-VIRR LST数据的过程中，第一阶段用于在周时间尺度上优化模型参数，第二阶段用于在日时间尺度上优化土壤湿度。选择了六个不同土地覆盖类型的中国通量观测站（高山草甸、草地、农田和果园）进行数据同化实验。FY3A-VIRR LST数据与地面测量结果进行了比较。
在本研究中，MODIS LAI 产品直接纳入模型中，植被参数在每周时间尺度上通过双重数据同化方案的第一阶段进行优化。在每日时间尺度上，土壤湿度通过双重数据同化方案的第二阶段进行优化。基于EnKF算法，首次将新一代中国气象卫星FY3A-VIRR的地表温度数据同化到CoLM中。LAS测量的源区通过足迹模型计算，并与FY3A-VIRR像元叠加。
datasetCn: 来自新一代中国气象卫星（FY3A-VIRR）的地表温度（LST）数据首次被同化到常规陆地模型（CoLM）中。选择了六个站点，分别是大门、广陶、阿柔、北京、密云和济源，进行数据同化实验，这些站点涵盖了不同的气候条件。结果与由多尺度表面通量观测系统生成的数据集进行比较，该系统包括自动气象站（AWS）、涡度协方差（EC）和大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）。
FY-3A地表温度数据将成为全球水分和能量平衡研究的新数据源。FY3A-VIRR LST产品可以提供每个像素的地表温度和发射率，数据以层次数据格式（HDF）存储，采用正弦投影，空间分辨率为1公里。来自中华人民共和国（PRC）三个主要自然区域（西部干旱和半干旱地区、东部季风区和青藏高原 alpine meadow）的六个站点的数据用于数据同化实验。
findingsCn: 结果表明，双通道数据同化方案能够通过同化FY3A-VIRR地表温度数据来减少模型不确定性，并改善地表通量的预测。

双重数据同化方案减少了模型的不确定性，提高了模型的预测能力。六个站点的平均偏差（BIAS）值从28.7 W m 2 变为5.3 W m 2，从 16.9 W m 2 变为16.1 W m 2；平均均方根误差（RMSE）值从71.7 W m 2 降至46.8 W m 2，从93.7 W m 2 降至70.8 W m 2；平均相关系数（R值）从0.75 增加到0.78，从0.66 增加到0.82。同化的蒸散发（EF）结果的平均偏差值从 0.21 降至 0.01，平均均方根误差值从0.31 降至0.15，平均相关系数从0.43 增加到0.73。比较结果表明，同化结果与激光雷达（LAS）测量值匹配良好，并且同化结果与LAS测量值之间的相关性高于模型模拟在大门、馆陶、阿柔、北京和济源站点的相关性。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method that integrates remote sensing and ground-based observations in alpine regions?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个结合遥感和地面观测的阿尔卑斯地区数据收集方法的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method integrating remote sensing and ground-based observations involves using a combination of automatic meteorological stations and a snow observation superstation to collect gap-free meteorological and hydrological data. This method also incorporates state-of-the-art techniques to capture snow cover properties and high-resolution soil physics datasets to study freeze-thaw processes.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种结合遥感和地面观测的数据收集方法涉及使用自动气象站和雪观测超级站的组合，以收集无缝的气象和水文数据。这种方法还结合了先进的技术，以捕捉雪盖特性和高分辨率的土壤物理数据集，以研究冻融过程。

Example.QuestionEn: What are some challenges faced when collecting data in high-altitude regions, and how can these be illustrated with specific examples?
Example.QuestionCn: 在高海拔地区收集数据时面临的一些挑战，以及如何通过具体例子来说明这些挑战。
Example.AnswerEn: Challenges in high-altitude data collection include the harsh climate, high altitude, and complex topography, which can hinder data consistency and completeness. An example is the difficulty in obtaining accurate snow density data due to strong winds influencing snow measurements, leading to the absence of snow density data calculated from snow depth and snow water equivalent (SWE) data.
Example.AnswerCn: 高海拔数据收集面临的挑战包括恶劣的气候、高海拔和复杂的地形，这些因素可能会影响数据的一致性和完整性。一个例子是，由于强风影响雪的测量，获取准确的雪密度数据变得困难，这导致无法根据雪深和雪水当量（SWE）数据计算雪密度。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you illustrate a recent data assimilation technique used to improve surface flux predictions with a real-world example?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否举例说明一种最近的数据同化技术，用于改善地表通量预测，并提供一个真实世界的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: A recent example of a data assimilation technique to improve surface flux predictions is the dual-pass data assimilation scheme that optimizes model vegetation parameters and soil moisture. This technique was applied using land surface temperature data derived from the FY3A-VIRR satellite, which were assimilated into the common land model (CoLM) to reduce model uncertainties and improve predictions at various sites with different climatological conditions.
Example.AnswerCn: 最近一个数据同化技术的例子是双重数据同化方案，该方案优化了模型的植被参数和土壤湿度。该技术使用来自FY3A-VIRR卫星的地表温度数据，应用于共同陆地模型（CoLM），以减少模型的不确定性并改善在不同气候条件下各个站点的预测。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is a comprehensive observation network in the context of hydrometeorological data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在水文气象数据收集的背景下，综合观测网络是指一个系统化的网络，用于收集、监测和分析与水文和气象相关的数据。这种网络通常包括多个观测站和传感器，能够实时或定期收集降水、温度、湿度、风速、流量等多种气象和水文数据，以支持科学研究、气候监测、灾害预警和水资源管理等应用。
Definition.AnswerEn: A comprehensive observation network in the context of hydrometeorological data collection refers to an integrated system of automatic meteorological stations, snow cover observation superstations, and frozen ground observation superstations that capture a wide range of meteorological and hydrological data. This network is designed to provide gap-free high-resolution data that support the investigation of watershed science, validate remote sensing products, and facilitate the development of hydrological models.
Definition.AnswerCn: 综合观测网络在水文气象数据收集的背景下，指的是一个集成的自动气象站、雪盖观测超级站和冻土观测超级站的系统，能够捕捉广泛的气象和水文数据。该网络旨在提供无缝的高分辨率数据，以支持流域科学的研究、验证遥感产品，并促进水文模型的开发。

Definition.QuestionEn: How is 'soil moisture' significant in the context of land surface models?
Definition.QuestionCn: “土壤湿度”在地表模型的背景下具有重要意义。
Definition.AnswerEn: In the context of land surface models, 'soil moisture' is significant because it plays a crucial role in dividing net radiation into ground heat, sensible heat, and latent heat fluxes. Accurate soil moisture data are essential for predicting surface fluxes, and the assimilation of remotely sensed land surface temperature data into models can aid in optimizing soil moisture estimates, thereby improving model predictions and reducing uncertainties.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在土地表面模型的背景下，“土壤湿度”是重要的，因为它在将净辐射分配到地面热、感热和潜热通量中发挥着关键作用。准确的土壤湿度数据对于预测表面通量至关重要，而将遥感土地表面温度数据同化到模型中可以帮助优化土壤湿度估计，从而改善模型预测并减少不确定性。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in challenges faced by data collection efforts in high-altitude alpine regions versus lowland agricultural areas?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 高海拔阿尔卑斯地区与低地农业区在数据收集工作中面临的挑战有哪些不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: High-altitude alpine regions face challenges such as harsh climate, high altitude, and complex topography, which hinder consistent data collection and the development of remote sensing technologies. In contrast, lowland agricultural areas primarily deal with challenges like accurately estimating surface fluxes in strongly advective environments and achieving energy balance closure in eddy covariance measurements.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 高海拔的高山地区面临着严酷的气候、高海拔和复杂的地形等挑战，这些因素阻碍了数据的持续收集和遥感技术的发展。相比之下，低地农业区主要面临的挑战是如何在强烈的平流环境中准确估计表面通量，以及在涡动协方差测量中实现能量平衡闭合。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do datasets focused on snow cover in alpine regions differ in their data attributes compared to datasets measuring land surface temperatures in arid regions?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 专注于阿尔卑斯地区雪盖的数据库与测量干旱地区地表温度的数据库在数据属性上有什么不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Datasets focused on snow cover in alpine regions include attributes like snow depth, snow water equivalent, and blowing snow flux, collected using equipment like the GammaMONitor and FlowCapt. In contrast, datasets measuring land surface temperatures in arid regions involve attributes like soil and canopy component temperatures, derived from thermal infrared imagery and assimilated with models using land surface temperature data from satellites like FY3A-VIRR.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 专注于高山地区雪盖的数据集包括雪深、雪水当量和吹雪通量等属性，这些数据是通过GammaMONitor和FlowCapt等设备收集的。相比之下，测量干旱地区地表温度的数据集涉及土壤和树冠组分温度等属性，这些数据是通过热红外影像获得的，并与使用FY3A-VIRR卫星的地表温度数据的模型进行同化。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the integration of remote sensing data with field observations improve the accuracy of hydrological models in complex terrains like the Qilian Mountains?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 遥感数据与实地观测的结合如何提高复杂地形（如祁连山）水文模型的准确性。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Integrating remote sensing data with field observations can improve the accuracy of hydrological models by providing comprehensive, spatially distributed datasets that capture complex climate and terrain variations. By validating remote sensing data against field measurements, it is possible to refine model parameters, reduce uncertainties, and enhance the prediction of hydrological processes such as snowmelt and soil moisture dynamics.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 将遥感数据与实地观测相结合，可以通过提供全面的、空间分布的数据集来提高水文模型的准确性，这些数据集能够捕捉复杂的气候和地形变化。通过将遥感数据与实地测量进行验证，可以精细化模型参数，减少不确定性，并增强对水文过程（如融雪和土壤湿度动态）的预测能力。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the scarcity of observation data in alpine regions, and how do these factors impact data collection methods?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致高山地区观测数据稀缺的因素有哪些，这些因素如何影响数据收集方法？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The scarcity of observation data in alpine regions is mainly due to difficulties of access and technological barriers, such as harsh climate, high altitude, and complex topography. These factors hinder complete and consistent data collection, making it challenging to develop remote sensing technologies and alpine hydrological models.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 阿尔卑斯地区观测数据的稀缺主要是由于获取困难和技术障碍，例如恶劣的气候、高海拔和复杂的地形。这些因素阻碍了完整和一致的数据收集，使得开发遥感技术和阿尔卑斯水文模型变得具有挑战性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the underlying causes of errors in remote sensing data validation and calibration in the context of alpine hydrology research?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在高山水文学研究中，遥感数据验证和校准错误的潜在原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Errors in remote sensing data validation and calibration in alpine hydrology research arise from the complexities of the earth system, such as strong winds affecting snow density calculations, as well as the need for integrated, distributed, and multiscale observation datasets to improve predictions of hydrological processes.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在高山水文学研究中，遥感数据验证和校准中的错误源于地球系统的复杂性，例如强风影响雪密度计算，以及需要集成、分布和多尺度的观测数据集来改善水文过程的预测。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it challenging to accurately estimate evapotranspiration (ET) in heterogeneous landscapes using one-source models, and what impact does this have on data collection strategies?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在异质景观中，使用单一源模型准确估计蒸散发（ET）是具有挑战性的，这对数据收集策略产生了影响。
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: One-source models struggle to accurately estimate ET in heterogeneous landscapes because they combine soil-vegetation components into a single source, ignoring the mixed temperatures and resistances of soil and vegetation. This limitation necessitates more complex data collection strategies that consider separate soil and canopy conditions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 单源模型在异质景观中难以准确估计蒸散发（ET），因为它将土壤和植被组件合并为一个单一来源，忽略了土壤和植被的混合温度和阻力。这一局限性需要更复杂的数据收集策略，以考虑单独的土壤和树冠条件。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential effects of establishing an integrated, distributed, and multiscale observation network on understanding the ecohydrological processes in river basins?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 建立一个综合的、分布式的和多尺度的观测网络对理解河流流域的生态水文过程可能产生的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Establishing an integrated, distributed, and multiscale observation network enhances the understanding of ecohydrological processes by providing comprehensive datasets that capture meteorological, snow, and frozen ground parameters. This facilitates the development and validation of models, helps evaluate remote sensing products, and informs predictions of how climate change and human activities impact hydrological processes and ecosystem functions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 建立一个综合的、分布式的、多尺度的观测网络，通过提供捕捉气象、雪和冻土参数的全面数据集，增强了对生态水文过程的理解。这有助于模型的开发和验证，评估遥感产品，并为预测气候变化和人类活动如何影响水文过程和生态系统功能提供信息。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives behind establishing a comprehensive observation network in the Heihe River Basin for hydrometeorological, snow cover, and frozen ground data collection?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在黑河流域建立综合观测网络的目标是什么，以便收集水文气象、雪盖和冻土数据？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objectives include addressing scientific questions such as providing accurate forcing data for alpine hydrological models, integrating observations with simulations for better understanding, and assessing the impact of climate change and human activities on fundamental processes.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标包括解决科学问题，例如为高山水文模型提供准确的强迫数据，整合观测与模拟以更好地理解，以及评估气候变化和人类活动对基本过程的影响。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What drives the need for a two-source energy balance model in estimating evaporation, transpiration, and evapotranspiration over heterogeneous land surfaces with vegetation?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在估算具有植被的异质土地表面的蒸发、蒸腾和蒸散发时，驱动对双源能量平衡模型需求的因素是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The need arises from the limitations of one-source models, which cannot accurately estimate surface evapotranspiration due to the heterogeneous nature of landscapes that contain a mixture of soil and vegetation with different temperatures and resistance to energy exchange.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 这种需求源于单源模型的局限性，这些模型无法准确估计表面蒸散发，因为景观的异质性包含了不同温度和能量交换阻力的土壤和植被混合体。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the key steps involved in setting up an integrated, distributed, and multiscale hydrometeorological observation network in alpine regions for data collection?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在高山地区建立一个集成的、分布式的、多尺度的水文气象观测网络以进行数据收集的关键步骤包括：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To set up an integrated, distributed, and multiscale hydrometeorological observation network in alpine regions, a combination of automatic meteorological stations (AMSs), snow observation superstations, and frozen ground observation superstations is used. These stations are strategically placed to capture data at both basin and sub-basin scales. The network includes measuring meteorological variables such as wind speed and direction, air temperature, humidity, infrared temperature, air pressure, four-component radiation, and precipitation. Additionally, snow variables like snow depth and snow water equivalent are measured, along with soil temperature and moisture across multiple layers to capture freeze-thaw processes.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了在高山地区建立一个综合的、分布式的、多尺度的水文气象观测网络，采用了自动气象站（AMS）、雪观测超级站和冻土观测超级站的组合。这些站点被战略性地布置，以便在流域和子流域尺度上捕捉数据。网络包括测量气象变量，如风速和风向、气温、湿度、红外温度、气压、四分量辐射和降水。此外，还测量雪变量，如雪深和雪水当量，以及多个层次的土壤温度和湿度，以捕捉冻融过程。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are followed to ensure data quality and consistency in long-term hydrometeorological observations in remote alpine regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在偏远高山地区的长期水文气象观测中，为确保数据质量和一致性，通常遵循以下程序：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To ensure data quality and consistency in long-term hydrometeorological observations in remote alpine regions, several procedures are followed: (1) gap-free data collection is facilitated through an extensive network of automatic meteorological stations, (2) state-of-the-art techniques and instruments are employed to capture snow accumulation and ablation processes, (3) high-resolution soil physics datasets are collected to monitor freeze-thaw cycles, and (4) continuous observations are maintained at selected key stations to provide long-term datasets, which are essential for model validation and to address data losses due to power or sensor issues.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了确保偏远高山地区长期水文气象观测的数据质量和一致性，遵循了以下几项程序：（1）通过广泛的自动气象站网络促进无间隙数据收集，（2）采用先进的技术和仪器捕捉雪积累和融化过程，（3）收集高分辨率土壤物理数据集以监测冻融循环，以及（4）在选定的关键站点维持连续观测，以提供长期数据集，这对于模型验证和解决由于电力或传感器问题导致的数据丢失至关重要。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions and technological advancements enable effective collection of hydrometeorological data in alpine regions with complex terrain and harsh climates?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些条件和技术进步使得在复杂地形和恶劣气候的高山地区有效收集水文气象数据成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The effective collection of hydrometeorological data in alpine regions is enabled by the establishment of an integrated, distributed, and multiscale observation network, which includes automatic meteorological stations and superstations for snow and frozen ground observations. This network captures spatially distributed meteorological variables, snow cover properties, and soil physics data, addressing challenges posed by the harsh climate and complex topography.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在高山地区，建立一个综合的、分布式的、多尺度的观测网络，使得有效收集水文气象数据成为可能。该网络包括自动气象站和用于雪和冻土观测的超级站，能够捕捉空间分布的气象变量、雪盖特性和土壤物理数据，解决了恶劣气候和复杂地形带来的挑战。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies enable the accurate separation and measurement of soil and canopy component temperatures for surface flux estimation in heterogeneous land surfaces?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法能够准确分离和测量土壤和冠层组分温度，以便在异质土地表面进行表面通量估算？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Accurate separation and measurement of soil and canopy component temperatures is enabled by using high-resolution thermal cameras in combination with the two-source energy balance (TSEB) model. The approach involves capturing thermal images to obtain soil and canopy directional brightness temperatures, which are then converted to radiometric temperatures for use in energy balance equations, allowing for refined estimates of evaporation, transpiration, and evapotranspiration.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 高分辨率热像仪结合双源能量平衡（TSEB）模型，可以准确分离和测量土壤和冠层组件的温度。该方法涉及捕获热图像以获取土壤和冠层的方向亮度温度，然后将其转换为辐射温度，以便在能量平衡方程中使用，从而精确估算蒸发、蒸腾和蒸散发。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise when using thermal infrared cameras to measure soil and canopy component temperatures in agricultural areas?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在农业地区使用热红外相机测量土壤和冠层组件温度时，可能会出现哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Challenges include classification errors in thermal images due to vegetation abundance, which can lead to overestimation of canopy temperature. Additionally, atmospheric upwelling radiation and transmittance, as well as uncertainties in incoming short- and long-wave radiation, can introduce errors in estimating component temperatures.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 挑战包括由于植被丰度导致的热图像分类错误，这可能导致对冠层温度的高估。此外，大气向上辐射和透射率，以及入射短波和长波辐射的不确定性，可能会在估计组成温度时引入误差。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is the dual-pass data assimilation scheme expected to improve predictions of surface fluxes when incorporating remotely sensed land surface temperature data?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 双重通道数据同化方案在结合遥感地表温度数据时，预计能够改善地表通量的预测，原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The dual-pass data assimilation scheme is expected to improve surface flux predictions by independently optimizing soil moisture and vegetation parameters, reducing model uncertainties, and better aligning model simulations with observations. By assimilating land surface temperature data, the scheme enhances the accuracy of surface flux predictions.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 双重数据同化方案预计通过独立优化土壤湿度和植被参数来改善表面通量预测，减少模型不确定性，并更好地使模型模拟与观测结果对齐。通过同化地表温度数据，该方案提高了表面通量预测的准确性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your evaluation of the methods used to ensure data quality and consistency in the context of alpine hydrological observation networks?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对在阿尔卑斯水文观测网络中确保数据质量和一致性的方法的评估是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The methods used for ensuring data quality and consistency in alpine hydrological observation networks appear to be comprehensive. These methods include the establishment of gap-free meteorological and hydrological data monitoring networks, the use of state-of-the-art techniques and instruments for snow cover properties, and high-resolution soil physics datasets for freeze-thaw processes. The approach also involves addressing challenges such as harsh climates and complex topography by integrating distributed and multiscale observations.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 用于确保阿尔卑斯水文观测网络数据质量和一致性的方法似乎非常全面。这些方法包括建立无间隙的气象和水文数据监测网络，使用先进的技术和仪器来测量雪盖特性，以及高分辨率的土壤物理数据集以研究冻融过程。该方法还涉及通过整合分布式和多尺度观测来应对恶劣气候和复杂地形等挑战。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how data collection methods can ensure the accuracy and reliability of meteorological and hydrological data in harsh alpine environments.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白数据收集方法如何能确保在恶劣的高山环境中气象和水文数据的准确性和可靠性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Gap-free meteorological and hydrological data are monitored from an observation network connecting a group of automatic meteorological stations (AMSs). These stations are part of an integrated, distributed, and multiscale observation network designed to capture data under diverse conditions, including snow accumulation and freeze-thaw processes. Techniques such as using state-of-the-art instruments at superstations and employing wireless sensor networks help ensure data accuracy despite the harsh climate.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 无间断的气象和水文数据通过一个观察网络进行监测，该网络连接了一组自动气象站（AMSs）。这些站点是一个集成的、分布式的、多尺度的观察网络的一部分，旨在在多种条件下捕获数据，包括雪积累和冻融过程。采用先进仪器的超级站和无线传感器网络等技术有助于确保在恶劣气候条件下数据的准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I’m unsure about how data assimilation techniques can improve the prediction of surface fluxes using remotely sensed data.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定数据同化技术如何利用遥感数据改善地表通量的预测。
Assertion.AnswerEn: A dual-pass data assimilation scheme is developed to enhance surface flux predictions by independently optimizing model states and parameters. This method uses land surface temperature data derived from the FY3A satellite to adjust vegetation parameters and soil moisture on different temporal scales, thereby reducing model uncertainties and improving prediction accuracy.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 开发了一种双重通道数据同化方案，通过独立优化模型状态和参数来增强表面通量预测。该方法利用来自FY3A卫星的地表温度数据，在不同时间尺度上调整植被参数和土壤湿度，从而减少模型不确定性，提高预测准确性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore various methodologies for ensuring high-quality and gap-free data collection in alpine regions with harsh climates and complex topography.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨在气候恶劣和地形复杂的高山地区确保高质量和无缝数据收集的各种方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Gap-free meteorological and hydrological data were monitored from an observation network connecting automatic meteorological stations. To capture snow accumulation and ablation processes, snow cover properties were collected using state-of-the-art techniques and instruments at a snow observation superstation. High-resolution soil physics datasets were obtained to capture freeze-thaw processes from a frozen ground observation superstation. The network was designed with distributed and multiscale observations to provide comprehensive data for hydrological modeling and validation of remote sensing products.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 通过连接自动气象站的观测网络，监测了无缝的气象和水文数据。为了捕捉雪的积累和融化过程，使用先进的技术和仪器在雪观测超级站收集了雪盖特性。高分辨率的土壤物理数据集则通过冻土观测超级站获得，以捕捉冻融过程。该网络设计了分布式和多尺度的观测，以提供全面的数据用于水文模型和遥感产品的验证。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please investigate the challenges associated with using satellite-derived data for monitoring surface fluxes in heterogeneous landscapes.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请调查在异质景观中使用卫星衍生数据监测表面通量所面临的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges in using satellite-derived data for monitoring surface fluxes include the instantaneous nature of satellite data that may be contaminated by clouds, and the mismatch in spatial and temporal scales between satellite observations and ground measurements. Additionally, terrain effects can influence the accuracy of satellite-derived land surface temperature retrievals, and there is difficulty in using these measurements for regional scale monitoring due to their point or patch-scale nature.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 使用卫星衍生数据监测表面通量面临的挑战包括卫星数据的瞬时特性可能受到云层的干扰，以及卫星观测与地面测量之间的空间和时间尺度不匹配。此外，地形效应可能影响卫星衍生的地表温度获取的准确性，并且由于这些测量具有点或斑块尺度的特性，使用它们进行区域尺度监测也存在困难。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze potential data assimilation techniques that could improve the prediction accuracy of surface flux models in various climatological conditions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请分析潜在的数据同化技术，这些技术可以提高在各种气候条件下表面通量模型的预测准确性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: A dual-pass data assimilation scheme was developed to improve predictions of surface flux by optimizing model states and parameters independently. The scheme assimilated land surface temperatures derived from the FY3A satellite into a common land model using an ensemble Kalman filter. The data assimilation was conducted at different temporal scales, with vegetation parameters optimized weekly and soil moisture daily. This approach reduced model uncertainties and improved prediction abilities across various climatological conditions.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 开发了一种双重数据同化方案，以通过独立优化模型状态和参数来改善表面通量的预测。该方案使用集合卡尔曼滤波器将来自FY3A卫星的地表温度同化到一个通用的陆面模型中。数据同化在不同的时间尺度上进行，植被参数每周优化一次，土壤湿度每日优化。这种方法减少了模型的不确定性，并在各种气候条件下提高了预测能力。
